item.description:
Join us for Flirt Fest- a fun annual Anti-Valentine's party. There will be light appetizers, best and worst pick up line contest, crowning of Boston's biggest flirt, dancing, DJ and fun. Tickets are currently $15 each or two for $20. You must get your tickets in advance. To get your ticket, visit:
 http://www.bostoneventguide.com/beg.php?Clk=3508700

* Light hors d'oeuvres from 7 - 9pm

* DJ spinning top 40 dance music all night

* Crowning of Boston's biggest flirts for 2012
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) directly inside the event area. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Flirt Fest: The Anti-Valentine's Party
